references.paper_title: Argoverse: 3d tracking and forecasting with rich maps
references.reason: This paper introduces Argoverse, a benchmark dataset crucial for evaluating trajectory prediction models, used extensively in this research.

references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper introduces nuScenes, another major benchmark dataset used in this study, enabling comprehensive evaluation across various scenarios.

references.paper_title: Argoverse 2: Next generation datasets for self-driving perception and forecasting
references.reason: This study utilized Argoverse 2, a newer, richer dataset introduced by this paper, further validating the model's performance on state-of-the-art datasets.

references.paper_title: HiVT: Hierarchical vector transformer for multi-agent motion prediction
references.reason: HiVT serves as a primary backbone model in this research, directly influencing the proposed LaKD framework.

references.paper_title: Real-time motion prediction via heterogeneous polyline transformer with relative pose encoding
references.reason: This paper offers a comparative method (FLN) that, similar to the presented LaKD, addresses length-agnostic trajectory prediction, providing a strong baseline for comparison.
